modName: Resurrect Dragon Shout and Call Nafaalilargus Shout
summary:
Resurrect a nearby fallen Dragon to assist the Dragonborn.
Call Tiber Septim\'s vassal, Nafaalilargus.
descriptionHtml:
Here\'s an update to the previous version \"Resurrect Dragon Shout\". I have added Nafaalilargus to Skyrim and he is summonable by using another shout \"Call Nafaalilargus\". To know who Nafaalilargus is visit - http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Lore:Nafaalilargus

Resurrect Dragon
-------------------------
When cast near a dead dragon, will resurrect the dragon up (by consuming 1 dragon soul from the caster) and make the dragon the caster\'s follower until the shout\'s effect wears out. Then the dragon will die and once again give back the caster the absorbed soul.

Call Nafaalilargus
-----------------------
Summon Nafaalilargus to accompany the Dragonborn and offer aid in combat.

Here\'s the mod\'s video description created by svaalbard. Thanks to him.
[youtube]pmZH_qgaEkU[/youtube]

Just enjoy the mod. Leave any comments. I\'ll try to answer them.

To learn the Resurrect Dragon shout -
1. Go to Rorikstead. Discover a Nordic Dwelling nearby.
2. Play through the dungeon. Defeat the bosses.
3. Learn the words from three Word Walls.

To learn the Call Nafaalilargus shout -
Go to the Serpent Stone.

N.B. -  This mod is SCRIPTED. If you want to uninstall the mod, make sure you\'ve unsummoned Nafaalilargus in your desired savegame, then only uninstall the mod.
author: SelfishUglyBad
